description: Detects the load of advapi31.dll by a process running in an uncommon folder Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Load of Advapi31.dll
query: (file.path:*\\advapi32.dll AND (NOT ((process.executable:(C\:\\Windows\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\\*)) OR (process.executable:C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\platform\\* AND process.executable:*\\MpCmdRun.exe))))
